sourcesContent:
{/* Results Section (Right) */}

Cost Analysis

{results ? ( <>

Cost of Collisions Per Year

Total: ${Math.round(results.yearly.total).toLocaleString()}

Direct Costs: ${Math.round(results.yearly.direct).toLocaleString()}

Human Capital: ${Math.round(results.yearly.humanCapital).toLocaleString()}

Willingness to Pay: ${Math.round(results.yearly.wtp).toLocaleString()}

Cost of Collisions Per Day

Total: ${Math.round(results.daily.total).toLocaleString()}

Direct Costs: ${Math.round(results.daily.direct).toLocaleString()}

Human Capital: ${Math.round(results.daily.humanCapital).toLocaleString()}

Willingness to Pay: ${Math.round(results.daily.wtp).toLocaleString()}

) : (

Select an area to see the cost analysis.

)}
